import React from "react"; export const ReturnsAndExchanges = () => { return (
Nazca RETURNS & EXCHANGES

You may return any purchased products from Nazca within 30 days of when the order has been placed. It should be in new and original condition (not damaged or shabby-looking as a result of much use) may be returned within 30 days of when the order was placed from the website. Returned goods and products must be accompanied by the packing slip and the certificate when applicable.
Online orders may be returned at a store or by mail, via a courier with a trackable method of the Customers choice. We recommend customers insure the package. Mailed returns are the customer's expense.

Keep Note : Shipping charges are non-refundable.

Online Return Request

To process a return request for your online purchase, you have to press the Order (Status/Returns) link at the bottom of any page or go to the Help or Customer Service page and in the Return, click on the Return Request.

  • Order Reference Number
  • Your Name
  • The last 4 digits of the Credit Card Used
  • 6-digit Billing Address Pin Code Area Number

Once your order results are showing below, please check the box next to the products that you are planning to return and press the Return button. This will submit your request to our team or processing department and an automatic response email with instructions on how to process your return will be sent to the email address you used when placing the order.

  • The full name should be written there as the "Bill" has generated when the order was placed.
  • The last 4 digits of the Credit Card are the last 4 numbers on your credit/debit card which was used to place the order. You can find this number on the front and back of your credit card.
  • 6-digit Billing Address Pin Code is the zip code that was entered for the billing address.

General Rules for Return Policy

In possible cases where the seller is unable to process a replacement for any reason whatsoever, a refund will be given to the customer.

During the product deliveries, while accepting your order, if you received a different or a damaged product, you will be given a refund (on the spot refunds for cash-on-delivery orders). Once you have accepted the delivery box, no return request will be processed, except for manufactures defects. In such cases, these category-specific replacement/return general conditions will be applicable.

Any specified product-related issues will be rechecked by authorized service personnel (free of cost) and attempted to resolve by replacing the faulty/defective part of the product. Full replacement will be provided only in such cases where the service personnel submit that replacing the faulty/defective part will not resolve the issue.

); };
